title: What is Trump’s approval rating? Poll shows term low, Epstein opinions
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's approval rating by some measures hit lows at the end of July. The administration has been hit by the Epstein issue for weeks.

title: Trump sons back new manufacturing venture amid tariff push
shortDescription: New America Acquisition I Corp, a firm backed by Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr., filed for an initial public offering of up to $300 million.

title: Texas governor accuses Dems of felonies, threatens expulsion
shortDescription: After more than 50 Democrats fled the state amid a redistricting battle, Greg Abbott gave them an ultimatum and deadline to return to Austin.

title: Trump calls 'Diddy' 'half-innocent.' What celebrities has he pardoned?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has spoken about his consideration of pardoning former music mogul Sean 'Diddy' Combs, calling him 'half innocent.'

title: What's Russia saying about Trump's nuclear threats?
shortDescription: Moscow downplayed President Trump's announcement that he'd ordered two nuclear submarines to "the appropriate regions" after heated Russian rhetoric.

title: Trump defends firing Labor Statistics chief
shortDescription: President Donald Trump defended his decision in firing Bureau of Labor Statistics Commissioner Erika McEntarfer, claiming the job report was "rigged."

title: Texas Dems leave state over redistricting fight
shortDescription: Texas Democrats left the state in an attempt to prevent GOP-led redistricting, drawing the ire of Gov. Greg Abbott.

title: Trump praises Sydney Sweeney's ad ‒ after hearing she's a Republican
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he's a fan of actress Sydney Sweeney's much-debated jeans ad campaign ‒ after hearing she's a registered Republican.

title: See Trump's transformation of the White House Rose Garden
shortDescription: President Donald Trump paved over the grass of the famed Rose Garden, to give it the patio-like feel of his Mar-a-Lago estate in Florida.

title: Did Trump remove the Rose Garden? See other White House changes
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has had the lawn of the Rose Garden removed and replaced with stone tiles. It is one of several White House renovations planned

title: Trump says he's hearing 'great reviews' about Rose Garden overhaul
shortDescription: President Trump said his "very white" new patio at the White House Rose Garden will reflect heat, cooling down outdoor events.

title: What next in court battle over Trump's tariffs?
shortDescription: What you need to know about the trade court dispute, which Trump has called "America's big case," and how it's likely to play out in the months ahead.

title: Texas Dems flee the state to block GOP redistricting vote
shortDescription: Democratic lawmakers in Texas said they were leaving the state to deny Republicans the quorum needed to redraw the state's 38 congressional districts.

title: Trump deploys nuclear submarines amid tension with Russia
shortDescription: Heightened tensions with Russia stem from President Trump's ultimatum to Moscow: make peace with Ukraine or brace for sanctions and secondary tariffs.

title: White House reveals Rose Garden renovations, see photos of redesign
shortDescription: The White House’s iconic Rose Garden is looking a little less rosy after the president swapped greenery for granite.

title: Christie likens Trump to 'petulant child' over job data firing
shortDescription: "He needs someone to blame," Trump ally turned critic Chris Christie said after the president fired Bureau of Labor Statistics chief Erika McEntarfer.

title: How has the 119th Congress already set records, had unique moments?
shortDescription: Just over six months in, this Congress has witnessed all-nighters, extra-long votes and flaring personalities.

title: Top Trump aide accuses India of financing Russia's war in Ukraine
shortDescription: A top aide to President Donald Trump accused India of financing Russia's war in Ukraine by purchasing oil from Moscow.

title: Who is Charlamagne tha God? Trump calls radio host 'sleezebag'
shortDescription: Trump responded to Charlamagne tha God after the host said some Republicans will use the fight over the Jeffrey Epstein files to take the party back.

title: White House retreats from IVF coverage mandate despite campaign pledge
shortDescription: The White House won't mandate insurance cover IVF, despite Trump campaign promise of expanded access to fertility treatment, Washington Post reports.

title: Will Rural America give up on Trump? These activists think so.
shortDescription: Rural organizers say Medicaid and SNAP cuts could help Democrats win rural votes in 2026. Republicans say: Don't count on it.

title: Who will win Senate majority in 2026? These are 11 key races to watch.
shortDescription: From the South to the Great Lakes, contested primaries and open Senate seat battles will determine who's serving for President Trump's last two years.

title: Trump pick Jeanine Pirro wins Senate confirmation to U.S. attorney
shortDescription: Jeanine Pirro won Senate approval as US attorney in DC as Republicans raced to confirm a long list of President Donald Trump's nominees.

title: Smithsonian removed Trump from impeachment exhibit due to 'appearance'
shortDescription: The Smithsonian clarified on Aug. 2 that aesthetic reasons were behind the removal of a placard with references to Trump in an impeachment display.
